009
010package imagingbook.common.threshold.adaptive;
011
012import ij.plugin.filter.RankFilters;
013import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
014import ij.process.FloatProcessor;
015import imagingbook.common.filter.generic.GenericFilter;
016import imagingbook.common.filter.linear.GaussianFilterSeparable;
017import imagingbook.common.threshold.BackgroundMode;
018import imagingbook.common.util.ParameterBundle;
019
020/**
021 * This version of Niblack's thresholder uses a circular support region, implemented 
022 * with IJ's rank-filter methods.
023 * 
024 * @author WB
025 * @version 2022/04/02
026 */
027public abstract class NiblackThresholder extends AdaptiveThresholder {
028        
029        public enum RegionType { Box, Disk, Gaussian }
030        
031        public static class Parameters implements ParameterBundle {
032                
033                @DialogLabel("Radius")
034                public int radius = 15;
035                
036                @DialogLabel("kappa")
037                public double kappa = 0.30;
038                
039                @DialogLabel("d_min")
040                public int dMin = 5;
041                
042                @DialogLabel("Background mode")
043                public BackgroundMode bgMode = BackgroundMode.DARK;
044        }
045        
046        private final Parameters params;
047        protected FloatProcessor Imean;
048        protected FloatProcessor Isigma;
049
050        private NiblackThresholder () {
051                super();
052                this.params = new Parameters();
053        }
054
055        private NiblackThresholder (Parameters params) {
056                super();
057                this.params = params;
058        }
059        
060        // method to be implemented by real sub-classes:
061        protected abstract void makeMeanAndVariance(ByteProcessor I, int radius);
062        
063        @Override
064        public ByteProcessor getThreshold(ByteProcessor I) {
065                final int M = I.getWidth();
066                final int N = I.getHeight();
067                makeMeanAndVariance(I, params.radius);
068                ByteProcessor Q = new ByteProcessor(M, N);
069                final double kappa = params.kappa;
070                final int dMin = params.dMin;
071                final boolean darkBg = (params.bgMode == BackgroundMode.DARK);
072                
073                for (int v = 0; v < N; v++) {
074                        for (int u = 0; u < M; u++) {
075                                double sigma = Isigma.getf(u, v);
076                                double mu = Imean.getf(u, v);
077                                double diff = kappa * sigma + dMin;
078                                int q = (int) Math.rint((darkBg) ? mu + diff : mu - diff);
079                                if (q < 0)       q = 0;
080                                if (q > 255) q = 255;
081                                Q.set(u, v, q);
082                        }
083                }
084                return Q;
085        }
086        
087        // -----------------------------------------------------------------------
088        
089        public static NiblackThresholder create(RegionType regType, Parameters params) {
090                switch (regType) {
091                case Box :              return new NiblackThresholder.Box(params);
092                case Disk :     return new NiblackThresholder.Disk(params);
093                case Gaussian : return new NiblackThresholder.Gauss(params);
094                default :               return null;
095                }
096        }
097        
098        // -----------------------------------------------------------------------
099        
100        public static class Box extends NiblackThresholder {
101
102                public Box() {
103                        super();
104                }
105                
106                public Box(Parameters params) {
107                        super(params);
108                }
109
110                @Override
111                protected void makeMeanAndVariance(ByteProcessor I, int radius) {
112                        int M = I.getWidth();
113                        int N = I.getHeight();
114                        Imean =  new FloatProcessor(M, N);
115                        Isigma =  new FloatProcessor(M, N);
116                        final int n = (radius + 1 + radius) * (radius + 1 + radius);
117
118                        for (int v = 0; v < N; v++) {
119                                for (int u = 0; u < M; u++) {
120                                        long A = 0;     // sum of image values in support region
121                                        long B = 0;     // sum of squared image values in support region
122                                        for (int j = -radius; j <= radius; j++) {
123                                                for (int i = -radius; i <= radius; i++) {
124                                                        int p = getPaddedPixel(I, u + i, v + j); // this is slow!
125                                                        A = A + p;
126                                                        B = B + p * p;
127                                                }
128                                        }
129                                        Imean.setf(u, v, (float) A / n);
130                                        Isigma.setf(u, v, (float) Math.sqrt((B - (double) (A * A) / n) / n));
131                                }
132                        }
133                }
134                
135        }
136        
137        // -----------------------------------------------------------------------
138        
139        public static class Disk extends NiblackThresholder {
140                
141                public Disk() {
142                        super();
143                }
144                
145                public Disk(Parameters params) {
146                        super(params);
147                }
148
149                @Override
150                protected void makeMeanAndVariance(ByteProcessor I, int radius) {
151                        FloatProcessor mean = (FloatProcessor) I.convertToFloat();
152                        FloatProcessor var =  (FloatProcessor) mean.duplicate();
153                        
154                        RankFilters rf = new RankFilters();
155                        rf.rank(mean, radius, RankFilters.MEAN);
156                        Imean = mean;
157                        
158                        rf.rank(var, radius, RankFilters.VARIANCE);
159                        var.sqrt();
160                        Isigma = var;
161                }
162        }
163        
164        // -----------------------------------------------------------------------
165        
166        public static class Gauss extends NiblackThresholder {
167                
168                public Gauss() {
169                        super();
170                }
171                
172                public Gauss(Parameters params) {
173                        super(params);
174                }
175                
176                @Override
177                protected void makeMeanAndVariance(ByteProcessor I, int r) {
178                        // //uses ImageJ's GaussianBlur
179                        // local variance over square of size (size + 1 + size)^2
180                        int M = I.getWidth();
181                        int N = I.getHeight();
182                        
183                        Imean = new FloatProcessor(M,N);
184                        Isigma = new FloatProcessor(M,N);
185
186                        FloatProcessor A = I.convertToFloatProcessor();
187                        FloatProcessor B = I.convertToFloatProcessor();
188                        B.sqr();
189                        
190                        double sigma = r * 0.6; // sigma of Gaussian filter should be approx. 0.6 of the disk's radius
191                        
192//                      GaussianBlur gb = new GaussianBlur();
193//                      gb.blurFloat(A, sigma, sigma, 0.002);
194//                      gb.blurFloat(B, sigma, sigma, 0.002);
195                        
196                        GenericFilter gaussian = new GaussianFilterSeparable(sigma);
197                        gaussian.applyTo(A);
198                        gaussian.applyTo(B);
199
200                        for (int v = 0; v < N; v++) {
201                                for (int u = 0; u < M; u++) {
202                                        float a = A.getf(u, v);
203                                        float b = B.getf(u, v);
204                                        float sigmaG = (float) Math.sqrt(b - a * a);
205                                        Imean.setf(u, v, a);
206                                        Isigma.setf(u, v, sigmaG);
207                                }
208                        }
209                }
210        }
211
212}
